arlut.csd.ganymede.server
Class DBLogEvent

java.lang.Object
  arlut.csd.ganymede.server.DBLogEvent

public class DBLogEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores a complete record of a single sub-transactional event, to be emitted to the DBLog log file, or sent to a set of users via email..

          Will be true if this log event has already had its email recipient list expanded in keeping with systemic logging rules.

Constructor Detail

DBLogEvent

public DBLogEvent()

DBLogEvent

public DBLogEvent(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> addresses,
                  java.lang.String subject,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  Invid admin,
                  java.lang.String adminName,
                  java.util.List<Invid> objects)
Constructor to be used for a mailout event. This constructor is used when an email message should be synthesized during the course of a transaction, and transmitted if and only if the transaction is successfully committed.

Parameters:
addresses - A List of Strings listing email addresses to send notification of this event to.
subject - a short string specifying a DBObject record describing the general category for the event
description - Descriptive text to be entered in the record of the event
admin - Invid pointing to the adminPersona that fired the event, if any
adminName - String containing the name of the adminPersona that fired the event, if any
objects - A List of Invids of objects involved in this event.

DBLogEvent

public DBLogEvent(java.lang.String eventClassToken,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  Invid admin,
                  java.lang.String adminName,
                  java.util.List<Invid> objects,
                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> notifyList)
Constructor

Parameters:
eventClassToken - a short string specifying a DBObject record describing the general category for the event
description - Descriptive text to be entered in the record of the event
admin - Invid pointing to the adminPersona that fired the event, if any
adminName - String containing the name of the adminPersona that fired the event, if any
objects - A List of Invids of objects involved in this event.
notifyList - A List of Strings listing email addresses to send notification of this event to.
